mapper.insert: insert into gc_shopaccount (accountId, accountName, cityName, cityNo, createTime, createby, deleted, email, limitflag, `name`, `password`, phone, provinceName, provinceNo, shopId, shopName, `state`) values (#{accountid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{limitflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provincename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})
